resources.string:
To enable the app I included:

 Google Dagger 2 - For DI and decoupling of the code

 RxAndroid - To work with RxJava in Android

RxJava - For reactive programming including retrofit calls

Square Retrofit - Network Wrapper to place network calls

Square HttpLoggingInterceptor - To be able to log each network call made for debugging purposes

For Architecture I chose MVP
